notes:
Part of the [[Rise of Devovorga]] [[World Quest]]. According to the featured article of August 26th 2010, ''"this will be a battle against the largest and most powerful monster Tibia has ever seen."''
Its sound "{{Sound|PEREAT MUNDUS!}}" is Latin for ''Let the world perish!'' {{JSpoiler|All players who sufficiently damage her during the last minute of the final fight will receive the [[Devovorga's Nemesis]] [[achievement]].}}
sounds: I tried to save you, but there's no use.
My soul, power, hatred, knowledge and fury are far away.
THE SEVEN? THEY WERE NOT ABLE TO CONTROL ME!
BRING IT! WE END THIS HERE!
YOU WILL ALL DIE - ONE WAY OR THE OTHER.
name: Devovorga
strategy: Have a [[Knight]] with level 250 or higher to block it using many [[Stone Skin Amulet]]s and [[Might Ring]]s, as it have very powerful [[Melee]]. It can also be trapped with [[Magic Wall]]s while the shooters stay behind the bridge.
